name: Fitness Zone
description: Fitness Zone is a full-stack fitness tracking and management platform designed to help users maintain a healthy lifestyle. This application allows users to track workouts, set fitness goals, monitor progress, and get personalized recommendations. It features a user-friendly dashboard with real-time updates to enhance the fitness experience.
challenge: Interactive and responsive UI with React.js
Backend with Node.js and Express.js for API handling

name: Book Library
description: Book Library is a full-stack web application designed to help users explore, manage, and track their reading journey. The platform allows users to browse books, add new books to the collection, and maintain a personalized reading list. With Firebase authentication, users can securely log in and save their preferences.
challenge: Interactive and responsive UI with React.js
Backend API powered by Node.js and Express.js
MongoDB integration for storing book and user data
futurePlan: Integration with e-book and audiobook platforms
